item.title: Linux Kernel Martian Source Logs Explained
item.description: Quite a bit of our customers’ IT guys happen to misinterpret the real meaning of the martian source traffic logs they see on their gateway hosts. Paste your logs in the above area and see their explanations here.

item.title: WiFi + Ethernet bonding
item.description: When I’m at home, I dislike undocking my laptop to move around the house because of the Ethernet-to-WiFi switchover takes long seconds and all my TCP sessions like SSH get lost. It’s because my laptop is assigned a different IP address on WiFi and on the wired network even if they belong to the same VLAN. Well, it looks like this is not the case any more.
